name: Cheesecalibur
description:
Arthurian Legend Beat 'Em Up in a tiny fantasy land

Seize your destiny as Prince Marcel de Camembert and embark on a journey across a bug-infested wilderness in serch of the legendary Cheese Wheel. Only then will you be worthy of being crowned Camembert King.

Fight your way through the enemy hordes, consume cheese to keep your health up and collect mushrooms to upgrade your life bar and damage.

Controls

Move: WASD or Left Analog Stick

Light attack: Left Click or  X Button

Heavy Attack: Right Click or Y Button

Dodge: Space Bar or A Button

Interact: F or Right Bumper

Pause: Esc or Start Button

Capybara Studios

Game Programmer: Andre Borja Miranda - https://andreborja.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/andreborja/

Level Designer / Tech Artist: Eduardo Cavalcante Almeida - https://edu-cavalcante.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/eduardo-cavalcante-almeida/

Project Manager / Character Designer / Writer: Naomi Nagayama Freire - https://naomifreire.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/naomi-freire-068520189/

Environment Artist / VFX Artist / Character Animator: Sebastian Beltran Convers - https://sebastian-beltran.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/sebastian-beltran-convers-74b069152/
